original_text: But remember this: I still have 7,000 people in Israel who have not worshipped Baal. They have not kissed his idols.’
korean_text: 그러나 내가 이스라엘 가운데에 칠천 명을 남기리니 다 바알에게 무릎을 꿇지 아니하고 다 바알에게 입맞추지 아니한 자니라

sentences.original_text: I still have 7,000 people in Israel
They have not kissed his idols
